scripts.build: rimraf dist && yarn genclient:ts && yarn build:main
scripts.genclient:ts: rimraf client/ts && openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./api/actions.yaml -o client/ts -g typescript-fetch -p supportsES6=true
scripts.genclient:rs: rimraf client/rs && openapi-generator-cli generate -i ./api/actions.yaml -o client/rs -g rust
scripts.gendocs: rimraf docs && node install_swagger.js && java -jar ./jars/swagger-codegen-cli.jar generate -i ./api/actions.yaml -l html2 -o ./docs
scripts.genserver: rimraf server && node install_swagger.js && java -jar ./jars/swagger-codegen-cli.jar generate -i ./api/actions.yaml -l nodejs-server -o server && cd server && npm install && cd ../
scripts.runserver: yarn genserver && cd server && node index.js
scripts.test: yarn genclient:ts && yarn lint && yarn ci
